doc.field: Time Inc. Advertising Promotion and Circulation Promotion Files
Time Inc. Advertising Promotion and Circulation Promotion Files

Includes two silk handkerchief maps of the L'Enfant Plan. Based on the engraving Plan of the City of Washington in the Territory of Columbia ceded by the States of Virginia and Maryland to the United States of America and by them established as the Seat of their Government after the year MDCCC by Samuel Hill, from the Library of Congress.

Enclosed with booklet. On cover: "L'Enfant's Plan of the City of Washington, 1792, presented by Time, The Weekly Newsmagazine in token of the opening of the 89th Congress, January 4, 1965." On page 1: "'Handkerchief' map with decorative corners."
Time Inc. Advertising Promotion and Circulation Promotion Files
